fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may grow a pumpkin, adding 1 shared charge to your other abilities
- At night, spend a pumpkin to guard a player, granting them powerful defense for that night (0 uses)
- At night, spend a pumpkin to scout a player, Investigating them (0 uses)
- At night, spend a pumpkin to set up a jack-o-lantern outside a players house, scaring away and roleblocking all visitors to that target (0 uses)
- During the day, spend 5 pumpkins to begin a ritual to call upon the pumpkin god (0 uses, 1 use per game).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Beginning the ritual to call upon the pumpkin god will alert everyone that “A pumpkin king has begun to summon the pumpkin god”. At the end of the next day, you may select one player to either ascend or descend
- Ascending a player will remove them from the game and will cause them to win, regardless of if they completed their goal
- Descending a player will remove them from the game and cause them to lose, regardless of if their faction wins or not
- If you are attacked during your ritual, you will die, regardless of if you still have your autovest up or not, nor can you benefit from healing or protective abilities during the ritual
- You have pumpkin bodyguards, granting you a one time use basic autovest

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game, or successfully ascend or descend a player
